articles.title: Saudi FA to review rules after fan whips player - ESPN India
articles.description: The Saudi Arabia Football Federation (SAFF) will review its "spectator code of conduct" after the "disgraceful" incident that saw an individual whip Al Ittihad striker Abderrazak Hamdallah.
articles.content:
Al Ittihad striker Abderrazak Hammdallah was whipped by a fan after Sunday's Saudi Sup Cup final. Neville Hopwood/Getty Images
